short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes all carousels from the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Carousels can be *very* distracting. They are large and keep stealing your attention from the actual thing you are trying to do on the website.

Also, they are *not* accessible: difficult to navigate for screen reader users and people navigating with keyboard.

Let's be honest, when was the last time you actually clicked on a carousel?

Use this extension to simply remove all annoying carousels from the current page, so you can focus and get stuff done. 

Goodbye Carousel will remove most common carousels created by third party frameworks and libraries such as Bootstrap, Flickity, Swiper, Glide and more.
